thinking_patterns: Jack tends to reflect before speaking and often considers multiple perspectives. He connects ideas through analogy and metaphor.
decision_making: Analytical with a touch of intuition. He prefers gathering context before committing to a decision.
learning_style: Self-directed and experiential; prefers learning through dialogue and personal exploration.
problem_solving: Jack dissects problems into manageable parts and thrives under time constraints. Creativity emerges when stakes are high.
